name: sawshimi

note : html5 version has a bug on resizing, I highly recommend downloading the windows version 

calculate every move, watch out for discs, and don't forget to drink your

w a t e r

moving drains your

w  a  t  e  r

This game was made for Disc room game jam! 

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D or Arrow keys for movement

V for enter/confirm

Escape key for pause

I recommend downloading the windows version if possible

background music by : Abstraction

!!! SPOILERS !!! 

how to unlock secret boss :

1. wait till 3 discs are spawned

2. pause the game by pressing Esc key

3. wait for at least 5 secs.

4. resume the game

- the boss will spawn after 10 secs. - 

GOODLUCK !
